SEARCH
Package danogl.components.movement_schemes.movement_directing

Class CommonMovementActions

java.lang.Object
danogl.components.movement_schemes.movement_directing.CommonMovementActions
public final class CommonMovementActions extends Object
A collection of string-IDs for common movement instructions. The various MovementSchemes ask their MovementDirector for a value corresponding to some of these actions. Each action contains in its suffix the type of value suitable for that action (vector, float, or boolean). The MovementScheme then uses that value to control the game object.
For example, a PlatformerMovementScheme might ask its MovementDirector for the current value corresponding to HORIZONTAL_MOVEMENT_FLOAT. That value would then be used to control the GameObject's horizontal velocity.
Author:
Dan Nirel
